title: That the Council minutes of September 16 and 23, 2024 be approved.

That item Report FCSFS24-022 - Notice of Public Meeting - Development Charges City-wide Background Study, Municipal Services Corporation, Potential Litigation, Report CSSS24-020 - Housing and Homelessness Plan Progress Report, Report MOPW24-023 - Downtown Business Improvement Area Asset Inventory and Service Review, Report CSRS24-010 - Joint Use Agreement with the Peterborough Victoria Northumberland and Clarington Catholic District School Board, and Bird Friendly City  be approved on Consent.

a) That Report MOENV24-033 be received for information; b) That Council provide staff with direction to proceed with Option 2 - Continue Waste Collection Services for the Exception List; and c) That clarity be provided involving Site Plans for multi-residential units and garbage collection expectations in the future.
a) That the proposed Volunteer Policy attached as appendix A be approved;

a) That the proposed Volunteer Policy attached as appendix A be approved; b) That staff be directed to hire a staff support position for a two (2) year pilot project, funded through the General Recreation Reserve, for the purpose of supporting the implementation of the volunteer policy and procedures related to neighbourhood ice rinks, community gardens, recreation programs, and other community volunteer programs within the Recreation and Parks Services Division; and

a) That the proposed Volunteer Policy attached as appendix A be approved; b) That staff be directed to hire a staff support position for a two (2) year pilot project, funded through the General Recreation Reserve, for the purpose of supporting the implementation of the volunteer policy and procedures related to neighbourhood ice rinks, community gardens, recreation programs, and other community volunteer programs within the Recreation and Parks Services Division; and c) That staff provide Council with an annual update on the status of volunteer programs through the duration of the pilot project.
That By-law 24-075, Being a By-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its meeting held on October 15, 2024, be approved.
That this meeting be adjourned at 6:38 p.m.
